long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you no longer have to suffer though an avalanche of 9.1 - 10 star reviews from IGN.com. This app will redistribute these numbers within a range that is more appropriate in order to move the average value closer to between 5 and 6

With version 1.1, all knack related titles will automatically have a 10/10 score. This is due to an obvious oversight on IGNs behalf.
